results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Frank Bagnall and Joe Scully

group_works.title: The Lost 600
group_works.creator_credit: Michael Robertson Film Productions, New South Wales. Dept. of Sport and Recreation and Michael Robertson

results.title: Safety in the shop: power tools
results.brief_description: Stresses common sense practices in the use of woodworking and metal working machines, including the drill press, grinder, jointer, router and various types of power saws and lathes. Shows the need for proper clothing, machine guards, making adjustments before starting the machine, dealing with broken blades and the value of neatness.
results.description: Stresses common sense practices in the use of woodworking and metal working machines, including the drill press, grinder, jointer, router and various types of power saws and lathes. Shows the need for proper clothing, machine guards, making adjustments before starting the machine, dealing with broken blades and the value of neatness.

Shows the need for proper clothing, machine guards, making adjustments before starting the machine, dealing with broken blades and the value of neatness.

results.title: Safety in the shop: hand tools
results.creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Coronet Films, David Thompson and Mary Thompson
results.brief_description: Shows the value in both wood and metal shops of keeping hand tools in good condition, the need to keep saws and chisels sharp, and possible dangers from broken handles, worn tips and burrs. Emphasises the importance of protective clothing, and demonstrates safe use of the forge and welding equipment.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Coronet Films, David Thompson and Mary Thompson
results.description: Shows the value in both wood and metal shops of keeping hand tools in good condition, the need to keep saws and chisels sharp, and possible dangers from broken handles, worn tips and burrs. Emphasises the importance of protective clothing, and demonstrates safe use of the forge and welding equipment.

results.title: Safety in the shop: basic practices
results.brief_description: This film emphasises the worker’s responsibility for safety in both wood and metal shops in clothing, lifting and carrying. Important also are the values of tidiness and the taking of adequate precautions in fire prevention.
results.description: This film emphasises the worker’s responsibility for safety in both wood and metal shops in clothing, lifting and carrying. Important also are the values of tidiness and the taking of adequate precautions in fire prevention.

results.title: Safety in the shop
results.brief_description: Stresses the responsibility of the supervisor in teaching and maintaining safe practices. Three typical accidents are shown and then the causes are analysed. Poor supervision and inadequate training are shown as contributing factors.
results.description: Stresses the responsibility of the supervisor in teaching and maintaining safe practices. Three typical accidents are shown and then the causes are analysed. Poor supervision and inadequate training are shown as contributing factors.

results.title: Safety in the mountains: snowcraft
results.creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Grahame MacFarlane and John Cooper
results.brief_description: Outlines the major points to remember in mountain craft; the preliminary climb and how and when to use the rope; climbing on soft snow and hard snow, step-cutting, use of crampons and general uphill and downhill movement.
results.creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Grahame MacFarlane and John Cooper

results.title: Safety in the mountains: bushcraft
results.creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Grahame MacFarlane and John Cooper
results.brief_description: The organisation of a bushwalking trip, showing the choice of equipment and its packing, food and clothing, ways to cross a river, building fires, marking a trail, handling firearms and other examples of bushcraft.

results.title: Safety in the Kitchen
results.brief_description: Danger areas and high accident risk situations in the kitchen are examined and safe working procedures suggested. Suitable for upper primary level.
